item.title: The Grackle
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

The Grackle (1997)

Cross is an ex-cop with a bad reputation fallen on hard times. While working his current gig, providing security for Chun Fat Lin’s underground casino the place is hit by triad gangsters flying high on “firefly,” a drug so hot addicts are prone to spontaneously combusting. Now the Mayor’s campaign manager has turned up dead in the joint and Cross is finding himself wrapped up in something really dirty- politics.

The Grackle (1997)

item.title: The Troublemakers
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Troublemakers (1997)

For seventy years, Galloway & Galloway has dominated the pharmaceutical field. From band aids to cough syrup, G&G made life easier for all of us. Then they decided to make life itself. In the early ‘80s, G&G created the next step in evolution – a race of genetically engineered superhumans, each bred with specifically endowed enhanced abilities. But the company – and the G&G employees who volunteered to be the test subject’s parents – never took into account one very important thing – puberty! XL! BLUR! CALAMITY! REBOUND! They live the life most kids would love to have…and they’d be more than happy to trade with you!

Troublemakers (1997)

For seventy years, Galloway & Galloway has dominated the pharmaceutical field. From band aids to cough syrup, G&G made life easier for all of us. Then they decided to make life itself. item.title: Timewalker
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Timewalker (1994)

Ivar, the time-traveling immortal adventures through history. Transported against his control by mysterious “time arcs” that lead him toward an uncertain destiny. Finding himself in Roman Britain, Ivar faces legionaries in the midst of a rebel assault. Meanwhile, a paradox leads our hero to a chance encounter with the Eternal Warrior in Bavaria – deep in the heart of a Nazi castle.

Timewalker (1994)

Ivar, the time-traveling immortal adventures through history. Transported against his control by mysterious “time arcs” that lead him toward an uncertain destiny. Meanwhile, a paradox leads our hero to a chance encounter with the Eternal Warrior in Bavaria – deep in the heart of a Nazi castle.

item.title: Psi-Lords
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Psi-Lords (1994)

4002 A.D., Earth has repelled the Malev Invasion, but now humanity must contend with an invasion of a different sort from the PSI-Lords! These 41st century successors to the modern day H.A.R.D. Corps, powered by nanotech implants that give them access to the full array of Harbinger abilities, have returned to Earth and nothing will be the same again!

ç›¸å…³ç§å­â¬‡Related Torrents

item.title: Operation - Stormbreaker
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Operation: Stormbreaker

An armored Nazi soldier has been spotted in France, immune to artillery and unstoppable. Rumor has it that Germany is withing days of launching an atomic bomb. What do you do? Assemble the first team of superbeings to stop this threat to the entire planet. That’s what! Enter the world of 1944 with Warmaster, Bravado, Nemesis, Jack Rapid and Doctor Tomorrow, and witness their battle against the Nazi incarnation of X-O Manowar!

item.title: Armorines
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Armorines (1994-1995)

Someone or something has sunk two of the U.S. Navy’s nuclear missile submarines in the past six months and the Armorines are being sent to investigate. But with their suit’s systems untried in an undersea environment, when the secret terrors of the U.S.S. Benchley swim into sight they might just find themselves dead in the water!

Armorines (1999)

When a race of alien insects invade the Earth, Sergeant Anthony Lewis is called back into active duty to lead the military’s most elite team of soldiers against them. Call in the Armorines!

item.title: Valiant Reader
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Valiant Reader

From A to Z, the state of the Valiant Universe in 1993. What is Bloodshot’s real name? Who is the Immortal Enemy? How many team members make up the H.A.R.D. Corps? Introducing the Valiant Reader, a summary of characters and stories populating the Valiant Universe.

Valiant Reader

item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

The Valiant Era Companion

The Eternal Warrior crosses paths with Toyo Harada, fighting over the fate of an old friend from decades past.

item.title: The Bad Eggs - That Dirty Yellow Mustard
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

The Bad Eggs: That Dirty Yellow Mustard

That Dirty Yellow Mustard: Part 1 of 4. An eight issue series consisting of two four part stories. “Dinophobia” - Panaam, the aged mentor of Ript and Claude, is being challenged to a death duel in the sky by a younger Pteradon who intends to replace him as the high, exalted wise one. The dueling part doesn’t scare him, but the flying part does. So it’s up to Ript and Claude to help Panaam overcome his fear of flying. After all, who better to teach him about being scared than a couple of spineless cowards? Beginning a brand new arc of stories, Bad Eggs mastermind Bob Layton explores the darker side of phobias and the laughs they can cause to the serious comic reader.

ç›¸å…³ç§å­â¬‡Related Torrents

The Bad Eggs - That Dirty Yellow Mustard (001-004) (1996-1997) (digital) (d’argh-Empire)

item.title: The Bad Eggs
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

The Bad Eggs (1996)

Out of the pages of history and into one extremely sick comic book! Prepare to meet Ript and Claude, the Dinosaur Bad Boys of the Jurassic, as they thumb their noses at T. Rex, Brontosaurs, Pterodons…basically anything bigger than they are. They’re rude, crude, and have vile personal habits. You’ve never met anything quite as bad as the Bad Eggs!

ç›¸å…³ç§å­â¬‡Related Torrents

The Bad Eggs (001-004) (1996) (digital) (Minutemen-Slayer)

item.title: Eternal Warrior Yearbook
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Eternal Warrior Yearbook

Travel through ages of conflict, from the bloody fields of Gallipoli to medieval Rome and the shores of pagan England, as the Eternal Warrior, attacked in the modern day by a priest with a mysterious vendetta, re-lives his history of violence.

item.title: N.I.O.
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

N.I.O. (1998)

The place? Japan. The time? 150 years in the future. The situation?The Japanese goverment has perfected the art of artificial intelligence and succeeded in manufacturing a robotic army.

When a young boy named Jimmu stumbles onto some foul play an intense chain of events is set into motion, including the activation of N.I.O., a robotic warrior programmed to protect Jimmu at all costs. But what happens when N.I.O.’s memory and programming are corrupted by an outside source â€“ the engrams of a human female accidentally downloaded into the N.I.O. programming? Will N.I.O. have a more human and humane agenda than the human does?

ç›¸å…³ç§å­â¬‡Related Torrents

N.I.O. (001-004)(1998-1999)(digital)(Minutemen-Slayer)

item.title: Harbinger Files
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Harbinger Files (1994-1995)

The secret origin of Toyo Harada, revealed at last! Witness the rise of the Valiant Universe’s most powerful man as he undergoes the journey from a frightened young boy to a deadly global superpower. What molded Toyo into a would-be conqueror and what actions from his youth will return to haunt the Harbinger Foundation’s future? This is the side of Toyo Harada you’ve never seen before!

item.title: Gravediggers
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Gravediggers (1996)

When someone turns up dead in New York City, the police are called in to investigate. When the police fail to turn up any leads, they call the Gravediggers. What makes these guys so special? The Gravediggers is what the men and women of the NYPD call the special unit that turns unsolved murders into arrests that stick.

item.title: Geomancer
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Geomancer (1994)

Clay McHenry – a blind ex-cop – is the new Geomancer, the Earth’s messenger! Can the formerly corrupt police officer live up to the role of Geomancer? Or will he dishonor it like he did the police force?

item.title: Darque Passages
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Darque Passages

It is night. A lover caresses a bare stomach. A dancer writhes to a rhythmic beat. A needle slides into an engorged vein. A scream dissolves into silence. It is night. A time for games. And no one plays the game of night as well as Alexandre Darque. He is a supernatural favor broker. What you need. He can get you. The coin of exchange is merely a little piece of your soul. That’s the price you have to pay, but have you ever wondered what it costs Darque?

Darque Passages (1994)

It is night. A lover caresses a bare stomach. A dancer writhes to a rhythmic beat. A needle slides into an engorged vein. A scream dissolves into silence. It is night. A time for games. And no one plays the game of night as well as Alexandre Darque. He is a supernatural favor broker. What you need. He can get you. The coin of exchange is merely a little piece of your soul. That’s the price you have to pay, but have you ever wondered what it costs Darque?

item.title: Armed & Dangerous
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Armed & Dangerous (1996)

It’s the corner you know you shouldn’t turn…the wrong side of the tracks…the place where losers go when they’re running for their lives. Bob Hall spins a spellbinding graphic noir of a boy’s arrival at the threshold of manhood, and the shadowy world of gangsters and gun molls who stand in his way.

item.title: Armed & Dangerous - Hell's Slaughterhouse
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Armed & Dangerous: Hell’s Slaughterhouse (1996)

The mob war between Arcko and Lanyon rages on. Lanyon has decided it’s time to take out Arcko and the Donovans. One of his first targets is Eddy and his mom’s apartment! The exciting saga of the back alleys of New York City continues, as told from the perspective of Eddy’s Uncle Charly, long thought killed in the Brooklyn Bridge Massacre.

item.title: Secrets of the Valiant Universe
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Secrets of the Valiant Universe (1994-1995)

Take a peek behind the curtain at your favorite Valiant characters. Learn the secrets of the Armorines, how Bloodshot survived the experiments of Project Rising Spirit, Armstrong’s secrets of binge drinking, the truth behind a H.A.R.D. Corps member’s death and more!

item.title: Visitor
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

The Visitor (1995)

A sudden appearance by a masked and caped stranger, trailing destruction and disaster in his wake has the heroes of the Valiant Universe on alert. X-O Manowar and the Armorines converge on L.A., both determined to find the identity of The Visitor and end his quest before the world is destroyed. Meanwhile, what is Toyo Harada’s interest in The Visitor? Could the master manipulator be behind the battle in Los Angeles?

The Visitor (1995)

A sudden appearance by a masked and caped stranger, trailing destruction and disaster in his wake has the heroes of the Valiant Universe on alert. X-O Manowar and the Armorines converge on L.A., both determined to find the identity of The Visitor and end his quest before the world is destroyed. Meanwhile, what is Toyo Harada’s interest in The Visitor? Could the master manipulator be behind the battle in Los Angeles?

item.title: The Second Life of Doctor Mirage
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

The Second Life of Doctor Mirage (1993-1995)

Parapsychologist Doctor Hwen Mirage and his brazilian bombshell, kickboxing-expert wife Carmen Ruiz are in world class, stuff-of-legend love. A love so strong it transcends time, space, death, and the sorcerous power of Master Darque. But can it withstand the second life of Dr. Mirage as an insubstantial specter of necromantic energy incapable of holding, kissing or even touching his wife?

The Second Life of Doctor Mirage (1993-1995)

item.title: Harbinger - Acts of God
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Harbinger: Acts of God

One day you wake up and everything is… different. Electric fire burns your fingertips; iron bends in your angry grip. You can hide in plain sight. You can soar above the clouds.

Different. Better? The governmnet doesn’t think so. And neither do the teens under the microscope. One of them objects… strongly. And he has enough power to change the world.

But who will follow him?

item.title: Shadowman - Deadside
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Shadowman: Deadside (1999)

Our lifetime is determined solely on a singular event. What becomes of one’s existence after death? Explore the mysteries of the world beyond, the Deadside, where the end for some is only just the beginning.

ç›¸å…³ç§å­â¬‡Related Torrents

item.title: H.A.R.D. Corps
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

H.A.R.D. Corps (1992-1995)

Maniac, Hammerhead, Shakespeare, Superstar and Gunslinger – brought back to life from a comatose state by Omen Enterprises with bleeding-edge technology neural implants that allow them to mimic Harbinger abilities one at a time. Their mission: to oppose the machinations of Toyo Harada and the Harbinger Foundation. Together they make up the elite of the Harbinger Active Resistance Division – the H.A.R.D. Corps!
